donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: The overall goal of the strategic plan of the national tuberculosis program is to reduce the burden of tuberculosis in Angola. This is to be accomplished by strengthening the provision of DOTS through the country with an emphasis on eleven provinces where most of Angola reside.

project_descr: Strengthened institutional capacity to detected and treated TB cases
project_title: Support to National Tuberculosis Control Program
